#### Overall conceptualisation
The typology is informed by the LIDD project and comprises the following 7 instruments of direct democracy, which are also depicted in the figure below. 

1. Agenda initiative  
2. Citizen-initiated rejective referendum
3. Citizen-initiated proactive referendum
4. Law-initiated referendum
5. Legislature-initiated referendum
6. Executive-initiated referendum
7. Subnational-initiated referendum

These are the most prevalent instruments of direct democracy across the Council of Europe states. Note, the typology does not include the Recall referendum
